items.sentence: I can't believe that I let Tom talk me into doing this.
I can't believe that I agreed to go to Boston with Tom.
Tom thought the watch that Mary had given him was ugly.
Tom eats brown rice more often than he eats white rice.
How long has it been since you've gone skiing with Tom?
Tom hasn't been told that he's required to do that yet.
It was below zero this morning, but I cycled to school.
The moment I held the baby in my arms, it began to cry.
I attended the meeting though my father told me not to.
I managed to persuade my cousin into accepting my plan.
I ran out of the room without knowing what I was doing.
I want to make a person-to person call to 212-836-1725.
The police could not establish the identity of the man.
The Tokyo Stock Exchange rallied at the end of the day.
What's the most convenient way to get to Tokyo Station?
The population of Tokyo is greater than that of London.
Tom should've waited until Monday to go back to Boston.
Tom told me he's miserable here in Boston without Mary.
Tom thinks Mary is better at French than she really is.
Tom says he has no trouble understanding Mary's French.
